channel.title: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?
channel.description:
how can i give an npc a mage attack and max hit for that. like with the first gfx has some kind of charge up, the second as one of the ancient shadow spells, and the last as shadow barrage gfx, how can i do this? (and make it multi hit)
and how do i make an npc hit someone through prayer (but not at maximum damage, like half of the damage)

item.title: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

recker450:

[quote]public boolean AttackPlayerMage(int NPCID) {

find something like this in the boolean

[quote] if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}[/quote]
under it add this

[quote]
if (plr.ProtMage == true && npcs[NPCID].npcType != @@@@) {
hitDiff = 0;
}[/quote]

change the @@@@ to an npcid that can ignore the prayer[/quote]

but change

if (plr.ProtMage == true && npcs[NPCID].npcType != @@@@) { hitDiff = 0;

to this

if (plr.ProtMelee == true && npcs[NPCID].npcType != @@@@) { hitDiff = 35;

Read full topic
item.source: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?

item.title: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

ok, so when i attack my custom abyssal overlord turned it into a boss i made it so the max hit is 70
but what i discovered is that when you use protection from meele, thats the attack style it uses it cant hit me hits zeros, what im trying to say is, i wanted it/expected it to hit like half or less than its max hit, like with protect from meele on it hits a 35 at max, anyway i can code this in?

Read full topic

item.source: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?

item.title: Give an npc a magic attack and making it hit through prayer?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

public boolean AttackPlayerMage(int NPCID) {

find something like this in the boolean

if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; }
under it add this
if (plr.ProtMage == true && npcs[NPCID].npcType != @@@@) { hitDiff = 0; }

change the @@@@ to an npcid that can ignore the prayer

Read full topic
